XCode Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2013-04-24  | Version: 1.2.3
XCode Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

xcode:ghunittest

Full name:

de.felixschulze.maven.plugins.xcode:xcode-maven-plugin:1.2.3:ghunittest

Description:

Run GHUnit Tests with ios-sim

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
buildDirectory File - Build directory.
User property is: project.build.directory.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
appName String - App Name
basedir String - (no description)
User property is: basedir.
bundleDisplayNameSuffix String - Info Plist of the app
bundleIdentifierSuffix String - Info Plist of the app
bundleVersionFromGit Boolean - Info Plist of the app
codeSignIdentity String - CodeSignIdentity to sign the app
coverageAppName String - Optional Coverage App Name for static libraries
coverageTarget String - Coverage Target
executeGHUnitTests Boolean - App Name
Default value is: False.
genHtmlCommandLine File - Location of the genhtml executable.
Default value is: /usr/local/bin/genhtml.
User property is: genhtml.
generateCoverageReport Boolean - App Name
Default value is: False.
infoPlist File - Info Plist of the app
iosSimCommandLine File - Location of the xcodebuild executable.
Default value is: /usr/local/bin/ios-sim.
User property is: xcodebuild.
lcovCommandLine File - Location of the lcov executable.
Default value is: /usr/local/bin/lcov.
User property is: lcov.
plutilCommandLine File - Location of the plutil executable.
Default value is: /usr/bin/plutil.
User property is: plutil.
provisioningProfile String - ProvisioningProfile to sign the app
retinaDevice Boolean - Should test device started as retina
Default value is: False.
teamCityLog Boolean - App Name
Default value is: False.
testDevice String - App Name
testNoAutoExit Boolean - App Name
Default value is: False.
xcodeCommandLine File - Location of the xcodebuild executable.
Default value is: /usr/bin/xcodebuild.
User property is: xcodebuild.
xcodeConfiguration String - Configuration to be built
xcodeProject File - Project Name
xcodeSdk String - Target to be built
xcodeTarget String - Target to be built
xcrunCommandLine File - Location of the xcrun executable.
Default value is: /usr/bin/xcrun.
User property is: xcrun.

Parameter Details

appName:

App Name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

basedir:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: basedir

buildDirectory:

Build directory.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: project.build.directory

bundleDisplayNameSuffix:

Info Plist of the app
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

bundleIdentifierSuffix:

Info Plist of the app
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

Info Plist of the app
  • Type: java.lang.Boolean
  • Required: No

  • Required: No

  • User Property: genhtml
